AI Description: R-Studio Server is a web-based integrated development environment (IDE) for the R programming language. It provides a collaborative and centralized platform for data analysis, visualization, and reporting.
Core Features: Web-Based Ide For R Programming Language, Collaborative Environment For Data Analysis, Visualization Tools For Data Exploration, Supports R Packages & Libraries, Centralized Platform For Sharing Code & Projects
General Tags: R Programming Language, Web-Based Ide, Data Analysis, Visualization, Collaboration
